thread.title: Big Brother Naija: Simi, Timaya, to perform at 5th Live Eviction Show
thread.title_full: Big Brother Naija: Simi, Timaya, to perform at 5th Live Eviction Show

author: Chidumga Izuzu
title: Big Brother Naija: Simi, Timaya, to perform at 5th Live Eviction Show
text: (DM Records) Born Simisola Bolatito Ogunleye, Simi started her career as a gospel singer, releasing her debut studio album in 2006 titled 'Ogaju.' She is popular for songs like 'Tiff,' 'Soldier,' 'Jamb Question,' 'Love Don't Care' among others. No housemate is officially up for possible eviction this weekend. After the housemates voted during the Nomination Live show, Biggie nullified the nomination, stating that he would decide who would be evicted this Sunday. Who do you think would leave the Big Brother Naija this Sunday? 2524259_fwid10 6263649 false http://pulse.ng/widget/id2524259?ctxArt=6263649&view=ajax&option=textPoll Is Big Brother Naija immoral? » Yes, It is a very immoral show No, it is an entertaining show Indifferent, use your remote if you don't like it Vote » Author
